title: Evolution, Accelerated (Rebroadcast)
description: A breakthrough in genetic technology has given humans more power than ever to change nature. It could help eliminate hunger and disease; it could also lead to the sort of dystopia we used to only read about in sci-fi novels. So what happens next?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
